Schedule

Schedule for Math 150, Methods in Biostatistics, Spring 2025

Here’s your roadmap for the semester! Each week, follow the general process outlined below:

  • Enjoy the notes / text

  • Attend class, review the warm-up and solutions if you have any questions after completing it during class. Read the weekly article before class every Monday.

  • Complete the HW assignment ( pdf & qmd linked below), submit the assignment via Gradescope from GitHub accessed on the course Canvas site. HW is due weekly on Tuesday at 11:59pm.

  • Homework assignments are found at the GitHub course organization. Due dates are provided on each assignment (roughly every other week). See the course GitHub page for more information on how to find, complete, and submit assignments.

  • There will be six in class quizzes.

  • The textbook is Practicing Statistics, by Kuiper and Sklar.
